mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_ID AS boardId, TITLE, WRITER, CONTENT, PN, CATEGORY, REGDATE, VIEWCNT FROM TB_BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_ID ) A ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{offset}+1 AND #{offset}+#{size}
SELECT BOARD_ID AS boardId, TITLE, WRITER, CONTENT, PN, CATEGORY, REGDATE, VIEWCNT FROM TB_BOARD WHERE BOARD_ID=#{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD (TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER,PN, REGDATE, VIEWCNT) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{pn}, SYSDATE, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, REGDATE=SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_ID=#{boardId}
